borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission reference: 2019/01678/FUL dated 17th September 2019 for the 'Erection of a single storey infill extension to the side of the existing back addition, following the removal of the existing lean-to glass roof; installation of 1no. rooflight to the side roofslope and 1no. rooflight to the rear roofslope of the main roof; installation of 1no. rooflight to the side roofslope of the three storey back addition; and alterations to other existing windows to ground floor rear, side, first floor side and second floor side.' Amendments sought to removal of proposed window, re-positioning of proposed window at second floor / roof level, replacement of existing French doors with 2 x timber sash windows at first floor level, alter window size and style into vertical frameless glass window, 2 x removal and 1 x re-positioning and re-sizing proposed window, enlargement of the rear door opening, 1 x re-positioning and re-sizing proposed skylight and 2 x windows at ground floor level.
